text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …… Haha, how unusual for me to be the first one to wake up.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
(No…… I know. It's not that I'm up early… I just 
haven't been sleeping properly to start with.)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ……… Maybe a run would do me good.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Ha…… hah…… hahh……

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
"Can't wait for the pretty dance", "You're gonna look 
so stunning", "Please share lots of pics in costume"……

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ……… Hah… I guess I was chosen because ——

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: —— I'm like a pretty doll?

text_block_list.name: Votive Dance Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Hmm…… No, it's nothing. My apologies. 
I think your dance is wonderful as it is!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …… Okay. If it looks "pretty" then that's good.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I think I've managed my part this time～

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …… Your part?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Mmlike, role maybe? I saw myself as the mascot for this. 
Since history and tradition aren't exactly part of my image.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
So I focused on what I know; generating buzz and trying to 
reach a broad audience, but while keeping a serious approach 
to the dance itself. That can be the "unexpected" side of me.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I thought that would be most appealing♪

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Aaaaahhhh, damn it!! …… I'm being so lame right now!!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
(I can't stand being valued purely for looks. 
But constantly just moping about it is as lame as it gets.)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
(Should I be more like Curren then? Understand my role and 
play the part? Will that… help me be more than just a doll?)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
(… No, that's not right. I'm not Curren. 
Something tells me that's not the answer ——)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Hah…… ha…… Huh?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Hohh! There! Nnnn… like this!!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Yukino……

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Oh! G-G'morning, Ms. City! 
Uhm, were you training on your own?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, something like that… What about you? 
Practicing the dance alone?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha… yeah. I'm the least experienced among us, 
and I'll be in the spotlight, so……

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
I just wanna make sure I don't become a 
burden…… Oh, whoops!!?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, are you okay? Don't push yourself so early in the day. 
And you're not a burden at all, not one bit.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Uhh… Hey, why don't we go freshen up together? 
It's still morning and we're both already all sweaty.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Whoah～ my tail's so fluffy…… I barely recognize it～! I could never dream you'd wash it for me… Hwahaa～……!!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
It's just a little technique I've picked up. 
The rest is thanks to oils and other treatment products.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Plus, this level of improvement is down to your natural features. 
Your hair, your skin, they're all great ——

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Oh, same for the dance. Yukino, you should be 
more confident in yourself.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Ms. City…… ehehe, thank yous.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
But still… we's performing in a major festival. 
I've got to push myself to not mess up!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: A major festival, huh…………

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …… Do you enjoy festivals, Yukino?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Huh? Well… yes, I do.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
We have a small autumn harvest festival in my hometown too. 
It's a whole lot smaller than the Festival of Illustrious Equines 
or the one from yesterday, though.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
But it's a ton of fun. We alls eat fresh harvest cooking from 
the stalls, dance around the fire, sing rice-planting songs.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Everything gets buried under snow in winter, and it 
gets so quiet… but remembering the festival's buzz 
always lifts my spirits.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Mmm… so that's what festivals make you think of.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Yeah～ What about you, Ms. City? 
How do you feel about festivals?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: To me, festivals are ——

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ah! There you are, both of you～!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Boo, leaving Curren out of the bath, meanies! 
We're the Votive Dance trio, aren't we～?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Owuhh, I'm reals sorry! We didn't mean ta exclude you…!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: No way, I won't let that slide☆ So～ we're gonna take a nice open-air half bath together and have a chat☆

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Let's go, come on～!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: (…… Curren and Yukino both have their sense of self.)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: But what about me……?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Oh… Prez! Can I talk to you for a second?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Oh, Gold City. What is it?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
You have some documents about the Festival 
of Illustrious Equines, right? Could I take a look 
at them, if you don't mind?
